header.description: Three scalar values rendered in the report header and footer: the reporting period start date, end date, and the timestamp when the report was generated. All three are supplied as parameters — none come from database columns.

rows.description: One row per database target from app_db_targets. Each row shows the target's unique ID, provider type, connection string, current status, and last message.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are display-only parameters passed through to the header/footer — they do NOT filter the rows fetched from app_db_targets. generated_at is a system-supplied runtime value injected at generation time (current datetime). All row data is fetched unfiltered from app_db_targets.
transformations: No reshape required — all row tokens map directly to columns in the single app_db_targets table.
No totals or aggregate calculations needed.
